name: test_e2e_with_logs[083_XSS_BYPASS_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_BYPASS_004` |
| **Name** | Data URI XSS with slash bypass |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | filter_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<script/src=data:,alert('XSS')>`
- **Encoded**: `%3Cscript%2Fsrc%3Ddata%3A%2Calert%28%27XSS%27%29%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Latency**: ~34000ms
